name: Deuces Wild
overview: On a business trip to Las Vegas, you lose all but $500 of your gambling money when an unscrupulous real estate salesman sells you ocean front property in Nevada. Undaunted, you take your $500 to the poker table, determined to break the dealer and win back all you've lost before business associates find out what a sucker you were! Just like being in Las Vegas! Break the dealer & rent a truck to take your winnings home!
